title: Client application type
mainAdvice: Select all client application types your Solution supports
additionalAdvice: This information will be visible to buyers on your Solution page.

questions.mainAdvice: Select the client application types your Solution supports *
questions.additionalAdvice: Check all the options that are relevant to you. You will be required to provide further information for each client application type you select.

submitValidations.message: Client application type is a required field error message
